content: change to white r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 6 sts yarn single_crochet in next 11 sts change to pink yarn single_crochet in 7 sts 24 sts 3 rounds r2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts put the safety eyes between r8 and r3 *2 single_crochet in st single_crochet in next st* repeat to r9 3 stitches away from the edge end 18 sts start stuffing r4 *2 single_crochet in st single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat to end 24 sts r10 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease change to white yarn *single_crochet in 2 sts r5 single_crochet in 6 sts change to white yarn decrease* x2 single_crochet in next 3 sts change single_crochet in next 4 sts change to pink yarn to pink yarn decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in 3 sts change to white yarn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in st 18 sts in next 4 sts change to pink yarn single_crochet in 7 sts 24 sts r11 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts change to white yarn *decrease single_crochet in next st* r6 single_crochet in 6 sts change to white yarn x3 change to pink yarn decrease single_crochet in single_crochet in next 5 sts change to pink yarn st decrease change to white yarn and 4 fasten_off pink yarn 12 sts r2 2 single_crochet in first st the rest of the stitches are left unworked 7 sts finish stuffing slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a r12 *decrease* around 6 sts long tail for sewing sew onto the sides of the body on r7 fasten_off leaving a tail thread yarn onto yarn needle and insert the needle through the front loop of each stitch feet make 2 pull the tail tight and weave in the end with orange yarn r1 4 single_crochet into magic_ring 4 sts beak slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a with orange yarn long tail for sewing sew onto the bottom of the body on r11-r12 r1 chain 5 slip_stitch into beg chain to join 5 sts keychain loop fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew onto center of face onto hold the penguin facing you and insert r7-8 hook through a stitch on the top of the head between r1 and r2 on the right side pull the pink yarn through wings make 2 and chain about 30 put the keychain onto this loop then insert hook through a stitch on the top of the with pink yarn head between r1 and r2 on the left side and slip_stitch tie a knot and weave in r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 6 sts all the ends 5 © adorably kawaii pattern is for personal use only please don t redistribute/resell the pattern in any way or form if you post the finished items you make online my only request is that say something like
